short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parses your job alert emails and your company's job boards and allows you to filter and copy for your Job Search spreadsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension collects jobs from your job alert emails and from hiring company's job board websites. It will then compile the data and provide a table to copy and paste into or directly send to your spreadsheet. 

Future versions will improve breadth of preferences and job alert email types and an automatic email-to-sheets pipelining.
